page.title: 11RECREATION
page.content: {Papercourt Sailing Club} The land was leased from Hall Aggregates after they had removed the sand. The club is opened on Saturdays, Sundays and Wednesday evenings in the summer. There are 700 many members but the public may also use the facilities People may sail without lifeguards but under their leasing rules a rescue team of at least people should be present {Hoebridge Golf Course} Development of Hoebridge Golf Course began in 1980 and the course was opened in 1982. Before the golf course was built the land was owned by Hoebridge farm; A dairy farm which delivered guiness milk from Jersey cows. The complex has a par 3 course, a driving range and an 18 hole main course. There are 400 club members but the public may 'pay and play.'
